name: Bench Press

name: Running
description: Run at a steady pace for cardiovascular endurance

description: Curl dumbbells up and down to work biceps

description: Classic yoga pose for stretching hamstrings and back

description: Swing kettlebell between legs and up to chest height

description: Stand on one leg to improve balance and stability

name: Lat Pulldown
description: Pull the bar down to your chest while seated

name: Cycling
description: Pedal on a stationary bike for cardiovascular exercise

name: Shoulder Press
description: Press dumbbells overhead while seated or standing

name: Hamstring Stretch
description: Stretch hamstrings by reaching toward toes

name: Deadlift
description: Lift barbell from floor to hip level with proper form

name: Jump Rope
description: Jump over a rope as it swings under your feet

name: Leg Press
description: Press weight away with legs while seated

name: Plank
description: Hold a push-up position to strengthen core

name: Cobra Stretch

name: Squat

name: Rowing Machine
description: Pull handle while pushing with legs in rowing motion

description: Complex movement from lying to standing while holding kettlebell overhead

name: Chest Fly
description: Lie on bench and open arms with dumbbells then bring together

name: Side Plank
